languages.text: "Вижу, что тебе доводилось пить мьод скьяльдов. Убийство врага, опозоренного перед боем благородной насмешкой, вдвойне приятнее".
"I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."
languages.original_text: "Вижу, что тебе доводилось пить мьод скьяльдов. Убийство врага, опозоренного перед боем благородной насмешкой, вдвойне приятнее".

traits.locale_text: "I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."
"I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."
"I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."
"I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."
"I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."
"I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."

languages.text: “我看得出来，你已经品尝过吟游诗人的蜜酒了。用光荣的蔑视之词羞辱敌人之后，再把敌人杀掉，这会让你倍感满足。”
languages.original_text: "I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."

traits.locale_text: “我看得出来，你已经品尝过吟游诗人的蜜酒了。用光荣的蔑视之词羞辱敌人之后，再把敌人杀掉，这会让你倍感满足。”

languages.text: « Je vois que vous avez goûté au mjod des skjalds. On prend deux fois plus de plaisir à tuer un ennemi après lui avoir lancé quelques piques bien senties. »
languages.original_text: "I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous avez goûté au mjod des skjalds. On prend deux fois plus de plaisir à tuer un ennemi après lui avoir lancé quelques piques bien senties. »

languages.text: 「スキャルドのミードを味わったようだな。名誉ある軽蔑の言葉で恥をかかせた後に敵を殺すのは、二重の満足感がある」
languages.original_text: "I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."

traits.locale_text: 「スキャルドのミードを味わったようだな。名誉ある軽蔑の言葉で恥をかかせた後に敵を殺すのは、二重の満足感がある」

languages.text: «Veo que ha probado el mjod de los skjalds. Es más satisfactorio matar a un enemigo después de humillarle con honorable desdén».
languages.original_text: "I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que ha probado el mjod de los skjalds. Es más satisfactorio matar a un enemigo después de humillarle con honorable desdén».

languages.text: "Man merkt, dass Ihr den Mjod der Skalden gekostet habt. Es ist doppelt so befriedigend, einen Feind zu töten, nachdem man ihn mit ehrenvollen Worten der Verachtung beschämt hat."
languages.original_text: "I can tell you have tasted the mjod of the skjalds. 'Tis doubly satisfying to kill a foe after shaming him with honourable words of scorn."

traits.locale_text: "Man merkt, dass Ihr den Mjod der Skalden gekostet habt. Es ist doppelt so befriedigend, einen Feind zu töten, nachdem man ihn mit ehrenvollen Worten der Verachtung beschämt hat."
